WEAPON.name: Reaper's End
effects: 50% Basic Attacks unblockable chance.
75% Chance to gain Luck on Combo Ender.
75% Chance to apply Team Curse on tag-in and every 10 seconds while user is tagged-in.
600% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ARMOR.name: Living Dead
effects: Once per match, resurrect after being defeated, and gain Invulnerability and 100% unblockable chance on Basic Attacks for 8 seconds.
25% Self heal on Special Attack 2, when below 30% Health.
Killing the opponent during Invulnerability from this equipment grants the additional resurrection.
1200% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Wailing Spirit
effects: Steal 50% of the opponent's Max Power upon user's tag-in.
100% Chance to obtain Slow after performing successful Special Attack 1.
30% of power stolen from this equipment is distributed to the teammates.
225% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only.
450% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Hellfire Blade
effects: On tag-in, apply Fire to both the user and the opponent for 10 seconds.
Fire applied to the user gives power instead of draining it.
User's Fire Attacks and Fire DOTs deal 80% bonus damage against the opponent.
When active user gains power, 35% of it is drained from the opponent.
600% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ARMOR.name: Witch's Ward
effects: 30% Resistance to all debuffs.
Gain 10% Max Power for each debuff resisted by the user.
25% Incoming damage reduction when the user is above 1 Bar of Power.
600% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Meat's Cleaver
effects: 30% Critical Hit Chance boost.
Meat's Cleaver is tossed at the opponent upon user's tag-in, dealing 50% damage of base Attack.
Meat's Cleaver deals 30% more damage and applies one of the following debuffs: Blind, Weakness, Cripple.
150% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only.
300% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Bloodsucker
effects: 25% Power generation boost.
40% Chance to apply Bleed on Special Attack.
Heals 5% of Max Health for each Bleed applied or resisted by the opponent.
150% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only.
300% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Bone Claw
effects: 40% Basic Attack damage boost.
40% Resistance to all DOT debuffs.
80% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only.
160% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Demon Eye
effects: 40% Recovery boost.
20% Power generation boost.
80% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only.
160% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)

ACCESSORY.name: Death Rattle
effects: 40% Opponent Critical Hit Chance reduction.
20% Max health boost.
80% Damage boost. Tower of Horror only.
160% Max health boost. Tower of Horror only. (Unlocks at fusion level X)
